short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to get the status of your USCIS Case when you open your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check quickly your USCIS (U.S. Citizenship and Immigration Services) Case status. You should not have to access the USCIS Web site to do the same thing every day! Quick and simple!
